articles.title: World shares sink after inflation driven retreat on Wall St - Business News - Castanet.net
articles.description: Shares declined in Europe and Asia on Thursday after a broad retreat on Wall Street triggered by worries over the impact of persistent high inflation on corporate profits and consumer spending.
